mapper.insert: insert into boards (title, content, category, member_id) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, 1)
mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.createdAt, m.email as member_email, m.name as member_name from boards b join members m on b.member_id = m.id where b.category = #{category} order by b.id
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.like, b.createdAt, b.category, m.email as member_email from boards b join members m on b.member_id = m.id where b.id = #{id}
